seo.title: Brand Safe Advertising | OpenWeb
seo.metaDesc: Best-in-class moderation tools, monitoring user-generated content to guarantee a safe environment for brands to connect with their consumers.
seo.opengraphDescription: Best-in-class moderation tools, monitoring user-generated content to guarantee a safe environment for brands to connect with their consumers.

contactForm.formContent: Right now OpenWeb has a limited number of partners we can work with in order to provide the highest quality service to each and every one. Let us know you’re interested and stay informed about how OpenWeb is empowering publishers and advertisers to change online conversations for good.
contactForm.headline: Let’s have a conversation.

ctaLink.title: Read about our moderation and safety framework

featureList.headline: In-house moderation
featureList.description: Best-in-class moderation tools, monitoring user-generated content to create a safer environment for brands to connect with their consumers.

featureList.headline: Third-party verification
featureList.description: Multi-layered protection ensuring page-level content safety. Customize safety guidelines and avoid custom content categories and domains related to gambling, offensive language, explicit/adult content, illegal drugs, religion, politics and more.

featureList.headline: Greater safety and transparency
featureList.description: No more ad adjacency issues, serve advertising around recommended publisher article cards. Choose to be on premium, viewable real estate separated from user-generated content.
